cristal-den/happy-pills.title: TThhEe PPaRRtYY-Time Mint-Als
cristal-den/happy-pills.description:
Blue Flask cooks chemicals at the Violet Vial, an establishment located in the Red Light District of Crystal Den.

She's struggling on her improved recipe for Mint-Als. She'd like you to bring her a sample of the fabled Party-Time Mint-Als, so she can figure out how it was made. Do Party-Time Mint-Als even exist, or are they just a junkie's fever dream ?
cristal-den/happy-pills.fetch-sample: Find a sample of Party-Time Mint-Als
